posts.post_content:
First Turn: Lay a Mana, Discard [Simian Spirit Guide](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Simian Spirit Guide) for an extra mana and lay [Smokebraider](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Smokebraider)  
Second turn: Lay a mana, tap [Smokebraider](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Smokebraider) and put [Nova chaser](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Nova chaser) into play championing the [Smokebraider](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Smokebraider).  
Third turn: Lay a mana, Attack with [Nova chaser](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Nova chaser), then [Double Cleave](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Double Cleave)..and [Brute Force](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Brute Force) if yo u want to :P
posts.html:
First Turn: Lay a Mana, Discard Simian Spirit Guide for an extra mana and lay Smokebraider
Second turn: Lay a mana, tap Smokebraider and put Nova chaser into play championing the Smokebraider.
Third turn: Lay a mana, Attack with Nova chaser, then Double Cleave..and Brute Force if yo u want to :P
Report Abuse

posts.post_content:
Akin to the comment I left on supreme exemplar..  
  
Turn one, Harbinger  
Turn two, Soul Warden  
Turn three, Incandescent Soulstoke  
Turn four, drop the nova chaser -> championing harbinger, gain 1, haste attack for 11, EOT sac -> harbinger rehits gain another life, search up a nova/supreme.   
  
22 damage by turn 5.
